document.full_text: from "gossip girl" on the upper east side to peasant girl from eastern france, french actress clemence poesy has crossed genres, languages and territories in her career.
document.title: french actress clemence poesy poised for stardom
lines_and_colors: from "gossip girl" on the upper east side to peasant girl from eastern france, french actress clemence poesy has crossed genres, languages and territories in her career.
